This App solve Sound Issue like sound sudenlly Cuts Off and Appers Again Randomly.
I Do Not Really Sure This Problem Is Talking About Hardware or Software , But Hey We Have Solution Here For That Without Breaking into Your Phone and That is Cool
You Will Hear Sound When You Press FIX Button if There Is not , Press Again Until You Hear Any Sound.You Can Change It On Slide Menu
If the Issue Still There,Try to Restart Your Phone
Thank to mIG-L for the video
After Hiding the Icon , You Can Not Open This Application Again Expect You Reinstall It.You Still Can Access this Feature from Quick Setting Panel
Check This Apps !,An application that helps fix Galaxy S7 Sound Issue , more https://goo.gl/bdLx7x
